securitygame

Class GameMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardPickup.GameMaster

  • public class GameMaster
extends java.lang.Object
    Pits Attacker and Defender agents against one another in the name of Science! STUDENTS: add your defenders and attackers to the sections in main that say "add defenders here" and "add attackers here" Also add your defender to the method getDefenderByName() and your attacker to getAttackerByName() You may also edit the rates in the Parameters class. Trust that these rates will be changed when the full tournament is run.
